coreAttributes.authorTag: A logo on the part of the piece of metal reads 'Red Ribbon Army'.
coreAttributes.name: android part
coreAttributes.description: A part of an android, surely if you calibrated it with arcane essence, you could turn yourself or someone else into an android.

useDescriptions.selfUse: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(take)] out the android part and look at it longly, analysing what it could be for. [npc.Name] then [npc.verb(put)] it back.
useDescriptions.otherUse: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(take)] out the android part and [npc.verb(show)] it at [npc2.name], wondering what it could be for. [npc.Name] then [npc.verb(put)] it back after seeing that [npc2.Name] [npc2.verb(do)] not recognize its usage.
